function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulty in measuring early infection rates","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of disease spread and impact on the population","Mitigation":"Implement rapid and widespread testing protocols, standardize testing procedures nationally","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, data analytics for trend analysis","People":"General population, public health officials","Owner":"Public health agencies, government"}]}
